name: consumers_detail
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool unofficial_trust_pilot.
Tool description: This API helps to query data relating to reviews and consumer reports to create a reviewing platform, such as : trustpilot.com
API description: Get detailed information of a consumer using the RapidAPI TrustPilot endpoint.

is_id.description: The ID of the consumer, as returned from the `/business-units/get-reviews` endpoint.
